title: Getting Started
content:
Welcome to BigLedger! This guide will help you get started quickly.
Prerequisites # Before you begin, ensure you have:
An active BigLedger account Basic understanding of blockchain concepts Internet connection First Steps # 1. Account Setup # Create your BigLedger account:
Visit BigLedger Platform Click “Sign Up” Follow the registration process Verify your email 2. Dashboard Overview # After logging in, you’ll see the main dashboard with:
Account overview Recent transactions Quick actions Notifications 3. Basic Operations # Learn the fundamental operations:
Creating transactions Viewing history Managing settings Next Steps # Explore more User Guides Check out Developer Documentation Review API Reference

title: API Reference
content:
